name: Lip Gloss
about: What it is:A high-shine, non-stick, long-lasting lip gloss with a clear, lightweight formula that helps nourish and smooth the lips..Formulation Type:Lip Gloss, Lip Balm & Treatment.Benefits:Hydrating, Long-wearing.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Works to attract and retain moisture to give the appearance of fuller lips..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:The formula helps to soften and hydrate the lips while the metal applicator leaves lips feeling cool and refreshed. It has been formulated to work perfectly with the REFY Lip Sculpt (sold separately) and act as a barrier to liner movement underneath.
ingredients: - Acide hyaluronique : Attire et retient lu02bchydratation pour donner lu02bcapparence de lu00e8vres plus pulpeuses..-huile de graine de jojoba : Favorise le collagu00e8ne tout en nourrissant et en revitalisant les lu00e8vres..-caprylyl glycol : Repulpe visiblement la peau et ru00e9duit lu2019apparence des ridules su00e8ches. .. Polyisobuu00e8ne, tridu00e9cyl Trimellitate, Octyldodecanol, silice dimu00e9thyl silylate, cire microcristalline hydrogu00e9nu00e9e, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) huile de graine, cire d'abeille synthu00e9tique, Butyrosphermum parkii (karitu00e9) beurre, acu00e9tate de tocophu00e9ryle (vitamine E), Caprylyl glycol, hyaluronate de sodium, glyceryl Behu00e9nate, Limnanthes Alba (u00e9cume) huile de graine, phu00e9noxyu00e9thanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply product to lips after using REFY Lip Sculpt (sold separately), on top of other lip products, or on its own. .-Gently squeeze the tube to release a small amount of product onto the applicator..-Swipe evenly over lips...Recycling Instructions:.-All box packaging is fully recyclable..-The lip gloss is made from Zamac metal and plastic, which can be recycled in your home plastic recycling bin..-To recycle the Lip Gloss packaging, ensure it is empty of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this, didnu2019t like it and then bought it again because I had completely forgotten. Thatu2019s how memorable it was at the time. I think I fell for the packaging. The metal applicator looks nice but ends up being quite messy since the gloss is thin and the tube leaks. I consider this more of a glossy lip balm like the Summer Fridays balm and not a true gloss. The formula is very thin not sticky, which means itu2019s gone in minutes. If youu2019re looking for a sheer gloss that feels nice on the lips and isnu2019t sticky, I love the Romand Glasting glosses. The colors are sheer and the consistency of the gloss is almost like a gel so it stays on the lips without being sticky. If youu2019re looking for a gloss gloss that lasts and makes your lips look juicy, you need a sticky gloss. Lawless and Makeup by Mario are my two current favorites for real lipgloss. Not recommended.

reviews.review_title: Genuinely surprised! The perfect Lip Primer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate lipgloss. Thereu2019s something about this one thatu2019s special. I like that itu2019s not too shiny and I like that thereu2019s no wand, so it applies easily without a mirror and I can truly control how much product I am appt and exactly where, wit just feels less gross over time and more portable because of itu2019s size. But what I really really love is using this as a primer for my lipstick. This gloss seems to grip your mouth in a comfortable way and it is a little tacky. Applied sparingly it is the perfect layer of moisture under my lipstick and really helps my lipstick glide on and stay on, lipstick becomes very comfortable and long-wearing and my lips look hydrated and smooth. was genuinely surprised that I liked this product! Now I carry it in my pocket. Also the fact that it has no smell and no taste is HUGE. I hate flavored, scented makeup!
